_exec_summary.SummaryText:
FARMERS UNION MERCANTILE & SHIPPING ASSOCIATION: ROAD 5 & J NH3 TANK STAGING AREA



OUR COMPANY IS AN AGRICULTURAL RETAIL BUSINESS THAT SPECIALIZES IN GRAIN STORAGE FOR AREA PRODUCERS AS WELL AS PROVIDING THE NECESSARY INPUTS FOR GRAIN PRODUCTION.  THIS COMPANY STRIVES TO MAINTAIN A SAFE AND HEALTHY WORK PLACE.  OUR FARMER OWNERS, MANAGERS, AND EMPLOYEES HAVE MADE EVERY EFFORT TO PLAN THE PREVENTION OF ANY ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.



THE ROAD 5 & J NH3 TANK STAGING AREA IS A STORAGE AREA FOR SIX NURSE TANK TRAILERS THAT WOULD HAVE AN APPROXIMATE TOTAL CAPACITY 27,000 POUNDS, FILLED TO 85% OF VESSEL CAPACITY.



THE EMPLOYEES AT THIS COMPANY HAVE BEEN TRAINED IN PREPARATION OF A WORST CASE OR ALTERNATIVE RELEASE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.  THEY UNDERSTAND THEIR DUTIES AND THEIR EMERGENCY ACTIONS THAT ARE SET FORTH AS COMPANY POLICY.  THE DISTANCE TO ENDPOINTS OF EACH  OF THE POTENTIAL RELEASES, HAVE BEEN SHARED WITH LOCAL FIRST RESPONDERS AND THEY ARE PREPARED TO ASSIST US IN PROTECTIONG THE AREA PUBLIC RECEPTORS.



OUR EMPLOYEES ARE TRAINED IN SAFETY PROCEDURES, PROPER PLANT OPERATION, PLANT MAINTENANCE AND THE EMPLOYEES ARE COMPETENCY TESTED OVER THE TRAINING MATERIAL.  EACH EMPLOYEE USES GOGGLES AND GLOVES DURING AMMONIA OPERATION AS WELL AS ALWAYS PROVIDING PLENTY OF SAFETY WATER DURING NURSE TANK LOADING OPERATIONS.



WITH THE ABOVE MENTIONED TRAINING IN MIND, IT MAKES IT VERY EASY TO REPORT THAT ABSOLUTELY NO INJURY ACCIDENTS OR PROPERTY DAMAGE HAVE OCCURRED AT THIS FACILITY FOR THE PAST FIVE YEARS.



OUR EMERGENCY ACTION PLAN IS DESIGNED TO MINIMIZE THE RISKS TO EMPLOYEES, THE SURROUNDING PUBLIC RECEPTORS AND THE AREA FIRST RESPPONDERS.  THIS COMPANY PROVIDES PLANT TOURS FOR OUR LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENT AND OUR ACTION PLAN HAS BEEN SHARED WITH THE COUNTY LOCAL EMERGENCY PLANNING COMMISSION(LEPC).  THEY ARE AWARE OF THE DANGEROUS NATURE OF NH-3, AND THEY HAVE AGREED TO ASSIST US IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY.
